Our equipment incorporates multiple technologies including infrared light absorption, sonic, capacitive sensing and vision-based technology.

Alcoa is the world’s leading producer of primary aluminum, fabricated aluminum and alumina. In addition to inventing the modern-day aluminum industry, Alcoa innovation has been behind major milestones in the aerospace, automotive, packaging, building and construction, commercial transportation, consumer electronics and industrial markets over the past 120 years. Among the solutions Alcoa markets are flat-rolled products, hard alloy extrusions, and forgings, as well as Alcoa wheels, fastening systems, precision and investment castings, and building systems in addition to its expertise in other light metals such as titanium and nickel-based super alloys. Sustainability is an integral part of Alcoa’s operating practices and the product design and engineering it provides to customers. Alcoa employs approximately 59,000 people in 31 countries across the world.

ANSYS designs and develops engineering simulation software used to predict how product designs will behave in manufacturing and real-world environments. Its integrated, modular and extensible set of solutions addresses the needs of organizations in a wide range of industries. ANSYS’ solutions qualify risk, enabling organizations to know if their designs are acceptable or unacceptable – not just that they will function as designed.

Ariel Corporation is a rapidly growing, dynamic and innovative manufacturer of gas compression equipment. Our consultants are entrepreneurial specialists who possess superior business, technical, interpersonal and critical thinking skills. Attevo is not a staff augmentation firm; we assume responsibility for managing projects and achieving desired results. Our consultants are full-time, direct-hire professionals who possess the burning desire to be experts in their respective disciplines. Bechtel Marine Propulsion Corporation (BMPC) is responsible for developing advanced naval nuclear propulsion technology, providing technical support to ensure the safety and reliability of our nation's naval nuclear reactors and training the sailors who operate those reactors in the Navy's submarine and aircraft carrier fleets.  BMPC includes both the Bettis and Knolls Atomic Power Laboratories.  BMPC has 6200 employees at main locations that include Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, Schenectady, New York, West Milton, New York, Charleston, South Carolina, Idaho Falls, Idaho and more and numerous shipyard and vendor sites around the globe.  BMPC operates the Bettis and Knolls Atomic Power Laboratories for the Department of Energy.  BMPC is dedicated solely to the support of the United States Naval Nuclear Propulsion Program.

column3: Edgepark Medical Supplies, headquartered in Twinsburg Ohio, is the leading distributor of disposable medical goods. We also supply Home Health Cares, Medical Centers, Hospitals and Pharmacies with the same goods. We are looking for outstanding individuals who are service oriented and are interested in joining a growing company with opportunities for career advancement. Previous medical experience is NOT necessary but a positive attitude, professionalism and integrity are a must!

Energizer is an independent, publicly held company, and the world's largest manufacturer of dry cell batteries and flashlights. With over 11,000 Associates and a presence in 131 countries, we're a leader and one of the largest manufacturers in the high-tech, highly-charged world of batteries and flashlights. We produce 6 billion battery cells annually, powering people's lives throughout the world.Every Energizer Associate plays a valuable role in pursuing and maintaining our dedication to innovation and leadership in an industry that continues growing at an aggressive pace. We're searching for smart, passionate people who want to achieve great things. Lubrizol owns and operates manufacturing facilities in 17 countries, as well as sales and technical offices around the world. Revenues for 2010 were $5.4 billion.

column3: Oakwood Laboratories is a privately owned specialty pharmaceutical company focused on the design, development and commercial manufacture of sterile injectable sustained release pharmaceuticals. Teach For America is the national corps of outstanding recent college graduates and working professionals – of all academic majors, backgrounds and career interests – who commit two years to teach in urban and rural public schools and become lifelong leaders for expanding educational opportunity for all children.Each year, Teach For America selects a diverse corps of individuals who have the skills and commitment to make a real impact on the academic prospects of students growing up today in low-income communities, and to exert long-term leadership in the effort to eliminate educational inequity. Teach For America trains all corps members during a rigorous pre-corps summer training program; places them as teachers with full salary and benefits in urban and rural public schools; and continues to support them through a two-year professional development program to ensure their success as teachers and beyond.
